verses.verse: And Moses<WH4872> with the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> commanded<WH6680> the people<WH5971>, saying<WH559>, Keep<WH8104> all the commandments<WH4687> which I command<WH6680> you this day<WH3117>.

And it shall be on the day<WH3117> when ye shall pass over<WH5674> Jordan<WH3383> unto the land<WH776> which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee, that thou shalt set thee up<WH6965> great<WH1419> stones<WH68>, and plaister<WH7874> them with plaister<WH7875>:

And thou shalt write<WH3789> upon them all the words<WH1697> of this law<WH8451>, when thou art passed over<WH5674>, that thou mayest go in<WH935> unto the land<WH776> which the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee, a land<WH776> that floweth<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>; as the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of thy fathers<WH1> hath promised<WH1696> thee.

Therefore it shall be when ye be gone over<WH5674> Jordan<WH3383>, that ye shall set up<WH6965> these stones<WH68>, which I command<WH6680> you this day<WH3117>, in mount<WH2022> Ebal<WH5858>, and thou shalt plaister<WH7875> them with plaister<WH7874>.
And there shalt thou build<WH1129> an altar<WH4196> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, an altar<WH4196> of stones<WH68>: thou shalt not lift up<WH5130> any iron<WH1270> tool upon them.

Thou shalt build<WH1129> the altar<WH4196> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> of whole<WH8003> stones<WH68>: and thou shalt offer<WH5927> burnt offerings<WH5930> thereon unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>:
And thou shalt offer<WH2076> peace offerings<WH8002>, and shalt eat<WH398> there, and rejoice<WH8055> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>.
And thou shalt write<WH3789> upon the stones<WH68> all the words<WH1697> of this law<WH8451> very<WH3190> plainly<WH874>.

¶ And Moses<WH4872> and the priests<WH3548> the Levites<WH3881> spake<WH1696> unto all Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, Take heed<WH5535>, and hearken<WH8085>, O Israel<WH3478>; this day<WH3117> thou art become<WH1961> the people<WH5971> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>.

Thou shalt therefore obey<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, and do<WH6213> his commandments<WH4687> and his statutes<WH2706>, which I command<WH6680> thee this day<WH3117>.
¶ And Moses<WH4872> charged<WH6680> the people<WH5971> the same day<WH3117>, saying<WH559>,

These shall stand<WH5975> upon mount<WH2022> Gerizim<WH1630> to bless<WH1288> the people<WH5971>, when ye are come over<WH5674> Jordan<WH3383>; Simeon<WH8095>, and Levi<WH3878>, and Judah<WH3063>, and Issachar<WH3485>, and Joseph<WH3130>, and Benjamin<WH1144>:
And these shall stand<WH5975> upon mount<WH2022> Ebal<WH5858> to curse<WH7045>; Reuben<WH7205>, Gad<WH1410>, and Asher<WH836>, and Zebulun<WH2074>, Dan<WH1835>, and Naphtali<WH5321>.
¶ And the Levites<WH3881> shall speak<WH6030>, and say<WH559> unto all the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> with a loud<WH7311> voice<WH6963>,

Cursed<WH779> be the man<WH376> that maketh<WH6213> any graven<WH6459> or molten image<WH4541>, an abomination<WH8441> unto the LORD<WH3068>, the work<WH4639> of the hands<WH3027> of the craftsman<WH2796>, and putteth<WH7760> it in a secret<WH5643> place. And all the people<WH5971> shall answer<WH6030> and say<WH559>, Amen<WH543>.
Cursed<WH779> be he that setteth light<WH7034> by his father<WH1> or his mother<WH517>. And all the people<WH5971> shall say<WH559>, Amen<WH543>.
Cursed<WH779> be he that removeth<WH5253> his neighbour's<WH7453> landmark<WH1366>. And all the people<WH5971> shall say<WH559>, Amen<WH543>.
Cursed<WH779> be he that maketh the blind<WH5787> to wander<WH7686> out of the way<WH1870>. And all the people<WH5971> shall say<WH559>, Amen<WH543>.
Cursed<WH779> be he that perverteth<WH5186> the judgment<WH4941> of the stranger<WH1616>, fatherless<WH3490>, and widow<WH490>. And all the people<WH5971> shall say<WH559>, Amen<WH543>.
Cursed<WH779> be he that lieth<WH7901> with his father's<WH1> wife<WH802>; because he uncovereth<WH1540> his father's<WH1> skirt<WH3671>. And all the people<WH5971> shall say<WH559>, Amen<WH543>.
Cursed<WH779> be he that lieth<WH7901> with any manner of beast<WH929>. And all the people<WH5971> shall say<WH559>, Amen<WH543>.

Cursed<WH779> be he that lieth<WH7901> with his sister<WH269>, the daughter<WH1323> of his father<WH1>, or the daughter<WH1323> of his mother<WH517>. And all the people<WH5971> shall say<WH559>, Amen<WH543>.
Cursed<WH779> be he that lieth<WH7901> with his mother in law<WH2859>. And all the people<WH5971> shall say<WH559>, Amen<WH543>.
Cursed<WH779> be he that smiteth<WH5221> his neighbour<WH7453> secretly<WH5643>. And all the people<WH5971> shall say<WH559>, Amen<WH543>.
Cursed<WH779> be he that taketh<WH3947> reward<WH7810> to slay<WH5221> an innocent<WH5355> person<WH5315><WH1818>. And all the people<WH5971> shall say<WH559>, Amen<WH543>.
Cursed<WH779> be he that confirmeth<WH6965> not all the words<WH1697> of this law<WH8451> to do<WH6213> them. And all the people<WH5971> shall say<WH559>, Amen<WH543>.
